app_description.message: Create a good search habit by yourself !

op_search_tip4.message: edit/add opration, double click a category tag and rename it

op_tip_fom_name.message: the name of search engine is necessary !

op_tip_fom_icon_timeout.message: get icon timeout, confirm the icon url is accessable !

op_tip_fom_pathkw.message: the prefix-keywords is not matched with using path keywords !

op_tip_save_success.message: save success, it will take effect in new page or flush a opened page

op_tip_notallow.message: this operation is not allowed, because a search engine is being edited or added !

op_mtip_pos_right.message: tips: the search2 bar will be located left while it work below picture or video type for a good user experience

op_mtip_display_auto.message: display the search name smartly: when search2 bar is at left, it will show only search catagory name; when search2 bar is at top or bottom, it will show full search name

op_mtip_right_indentdistance.message: be effective only when search2 bar's position is at right

op_mtip_intervaldistance.message: when [tile search2 bar] is selected, this will not be effective

op_mtip_cartoon.message: a animation will show when click the [more] on search2 bar

op_mtip_borderline.message: put color on searchbar's border so that looks more beautiful

op_mtip_form_url.message: use %s replace the text keywords and %p replace the url address of a picture please

op_mtip_form_tf.message: some search engine identifies the search-type use url parameter, but not hostname, such as google, bing. you must input a typeflag here,for example: &tbm=isch, &tbm=web and so on

op_mtip_form_prkw.message: a prefix of keywords is the key-name of %s, for example: q=; you should input url between http:// and keywords when [use path keywods] is checked

op_mtip_form_enc.message: it's necessary only when the search engine is not supports utf-8 encoding. you can find the search engine's encoding with clicking: [chrome customize control menu]>[Tools]>[Encoding]

op_mtip_form_googleico.message:
Google provides a icon service for most of website, you can use it if you can't find the icon of search engine, the serviice url is: http://www.google.com/s2
/favicons?domain=website-domain

op_mtip_form_pathkw.message: this is a partiular option for compats few search engines, for example: http://search.suning.com/%s/；you should input [keywords prerix] cooperatively if checked

oth_readme1.message: search2 has three principles in design, they are lightly, simply and easily

oth_readme2.message: search2 has not imported any Javascript library third-party, and it's loaded only in a search website which you defined

oth_readme3.message: search2's UI is very consice, it take up only a small place, and you can even hide it, it keep a good web experience as soon as possible

oth_readme4.message: search2 follows many Google-ideas also: Focus on the user and considers fully user habits; Fast is better than slow, responses quickly for web experiences; Democracy and fairness on the web works, search2 donot binds any search engine, even google self, you can define all search engines yourself

oth_readme5.message: search2 needs that the chrome webkit version greater than 21

oth_ipr3.message: are owned by google corporation, Google is entitled to recover the right; search2's source code is owned by its author, it's not allowed for modification and release again on chrome market or third-party browser market which based chrome, search2 reserves the right to pursue legal responsibilities

oth_reset_confirm.message: you are reseting the configure to default, the previous config will be losed, you sure do?

oth_tab_rm_confirm.message: you are removing this search category including all search engine in the category, you sure do?
